flawed_nl_solution:
The season is broken up into 22/2=<<22/2=11>>11 episode based on cost
The first 11 episodes cost 11*1000=$<<11*1000=11000>>11000
The next set of episodes cost 1000*1.2=$<<1000*1.2=1200>>1200 more per episode
So they cost 1000+1200=$<<1000+1200=22000>>22000 each
So in total they cost 22000*11=$<<22000*11=242000>>242000
So in total the season cost 242000+11000=$<<242000+11000=253000>>253000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2200.0, not 22000.0. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
